name: Gachamon
description:
A submission for Dogpit Jam XII hosted by Team Dogpit.

Concept

Inspired by Pokemon RNG manipulation, this game faithfully implements Gen 1 Pokemon battle mechanics with a simplified RNG that can easily be viewed and manipulated by the player. You'll need to take every advantage you can get if you want to proceed in this overly-monetized gacha-game version of Pokemon.

Controls

Keyboard, mouse, and gamepad controls are all supported to varying degrees.

  • Arrow Up / W: Move up
  • Arrow Left / A: Move left
  • Arrow Down / S Move down
  • Arrow Right / D: Move right
  • Enter / Spacebar / Gamepad A: Interact or confirm menu selection
  • Escape / Gamepad B: Open main menu or cancel menu selection
